resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The ID of the user who should receive the direct message
userId.ai_hint: The ID of the user who should receive the direct message

text.name: text
text.description: The text of the status update. URL encode as necessary. t.co link wrapping will affect character counts.
text.ai_hint: The text of the status update. URL encode as necessary. t.co link wrapping will affect character counts.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: trimUser
options.description: Whether each tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object including only the status authors numerical ID

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

searchText.name: searchText
searchText.description: A UTF-8, URL-encoded search query of 500 characters maximum, including operators. Queries may additionally be limited by complexity. Check the searching examples here.
searchText.ai_hint: A UTF-8, URL-encoded search query of 500 characters maximum, including operators. Queries may additionally be limited by complexity. Check the searching examples here.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

conditional_rules: IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'directMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'directMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'directMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'tweetId'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'searchText'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'tweet' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'like' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'tweetId'
IF operation == 'like' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'retweet' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'tweetId'
IF operation == 'retweet' AND resource == 'tweet' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
